**What we offer:**

* Access to a strong developer community within the company to learn and grow.
* Competitive Salary, Good work-life balance along with health and life insurance.

title: DevOps engineer with a curious mind
description:
##### **Are you a DevOps engineer with a curious mind that can join us on our modernization journey? We need to strengthen the team with a DevOps engineer who knows their way around the cloud and is used to running containers with Kubernetes.**


Our current tech playground is a hybrid of a legacy monolith and newly built microservices, On-Prem data centers and Cloud services. For a while we had the ambition to go “All in” on Cloud but recently we started to explore how to establish a modern On-Prem setup for some of our solutions, while others will stay in the Cloud. In other words, to enjoy working at Prisjakt you need to master both the Cloud and have experience of On-Prem solutions.


At Prisjakt we work in a domain setup and live by agile principles. All teams work with CI/CD, meaning frequent deployments to production that the teams do themselves. As DevOps engineer we would like you to work especially close with our developers. On a daily basis the DevOps team split their time on building DevOps capabilities, maintaining/upgrading existing solutions as well as supporting our development teams with various DevOps and platform requests. You will also be part of our On Call team that practise “first aid” in case our site would have some health issues.

##### **Our wishlist (we understand that you might not tick all the boxes):**

* Cloud architecture, preferably Google
* Containers & Kubernetes
* Thorough understanding of CI/CD (Gitlab)
* Data-intensive applications (Kafka, Flink)
* Network & Databases
* Observability
* Infrastructure as code & Immutable infrastructure
* Automation - in all aspects :) (Terraform, Ansible)
* Event based architecture
* Elasticsearch experience is a plus
  

##### **Your characteristics:**

* *Drive* and *passion -* for DevOps tech and ways of working
* *Honest* - don’t be afraid to speak up - at Prisjakt we all do!
* *Patient* - neither Rome, nor our future architecture was built in a day
* *Communicative -* close collaboration with, and guidance to, our developers in DevOps matters.

*When*: We would like you to start tomorrow but we understand that you might have obligations today and those need to be handed over first.

*Where*: You will be located at our beautiful Malmö or Ängelholm studios.

*What we offer:* The very core in our employee experience is to care for our employees. With us you have flexible hours and a hybrid way of working where we meet 3 days per week in the studio. You get two paid working hours each week dedicated to working out and you’re always off on your birthday. If you’re curious to know more about life at Prisjakt, our benefits or why we exist you should definitely explore our career site. Want to meet the brilliant people and get a feel for the vibe at our studios? Make sure to follow us on Instagram @Prisjaktlife.

title: Utvecklare inom inbyggda system
description:
**Vem är du?**  

Vi söker en erfaren mjukvaruutvecklare som gillar embedded, C och C++. Du som går igång på möjligheten att fortsätta utvecklas och prova något nytt trots att du redan har minst 5 års erfarenhet.


Våra kunder är allt från de stora bolagen inom fordon, försvar, gruvindustri och läkemedel, till de lite mindre som kanske inte har någon egen utvecklingsavdelning. Det ger en bredd av utmaningar och även variation i form av programspråk och utvecklingsmiljö.


Vi vill att du som person är nyfiken, gillar teknik och har en önskan att skapa den bästa lösningen för våra kunder. Du tar ansvar för ditt arbete och det är ett stort plus om du precis som vi gillar att ha roligt på jobbet!

**Vad gör vi?**  

Under de senaste åren har vi hunnit utveckla styrsystem åt stora tillverkande företag, skapat bildanalysverktyg för PC med egna smarta algoritmer samt visualiserat produkter i multi user VR. Vi avbildar ytor i 3D med egenutvecklad kamerateknik, vi har byggt prototyper för autonoma fordon och implementerat mjukvara för att hantera omvärldens ökade krav på cybersäkerhet.


Flera av våra partners är lite mindre företag där vi fungerar som deras externa FoU-avdelning och där vi arbetar tillsammans för att se vad vi kan åstadkomma med elektronik och digitalisering. Till de stora företagen erbjuder vi allt oftare specialistkunskap på distans från våra kontor i form av satellitverksamhet, där vi kan erbjuda kompetens som är svår för dem att hitta lokalt.


Oavsett vilken kund vi arbetar tillsammans med, eller storlek på projekt, är målsättningen att alltid erbjuda våra medarbetare en chans att ta nästa steg i sin utveckling.


**Hur vi rullar?**


På Knightec får du en arbetsplats med personer som bryr sig. Din vilja, intressen och ambitioner leder vägen, vi förser dig med verktygen och förutsättningarna för att lyckas. Vår miljö präglas av tillit, transparens och samarbete. När du tycker något är lätt finns alltid någon som behöver stöttning av dig och när du tycker något är svårt finns alltid hjälp att få. Det viktiga är att du inte ger upp då vi tror att tillfredställelsen i att lösa en svår uppgift är mycket mer givande än att lösa något vi redan kan.


Knightec har 11 kontor i Sverige. Just denna tjänst gäller för placering i Umeå. Vi erbjuder fräscha, centralt placerade lokaler och jobbar aktivt för en levande och starkt kontorsgemenskap. För att i underlätta vardagen för individen så är arbete på distans delar av veckan också vanligt förekommande. Vi tror på värdet i att ta en kaffe tillsammans och snickesnacka runt tekniska problem eller fritidsintressen på plats på vårt kontor. Om du också gillar att cykla MTB med oss, att baka tyska kringlor eller något annat som du gillar, så kommer det här bli väldigt bra.

title: Web fullstack developer to Prisjakt
description:
**Web fullstack developer to Prisjakt**


At Prisjakt, we're on a mission to empower consumers to make better decisions. We aim for Prisjakt to be that trustworthy place where consumers can get a true and unbiased overview of the whole market: all products, all prices and all the information they need to make the right decision. To support this important mission we’re on the lookout for an senior web fullstack developer who’s eager to embark on the epic journey of building the best price and product comparison service in the universe.

**Your vibe and tribe**


As a senior web fullstack developer at Prisjakt your mission will be to craft the core of our product, making it the best possible experience for our users. And here’s the fun part: you won’t be alone on this adventure. You’ll be a part of one of our domain teams. These agile, cross-functional teams are dedicated to specific areas of Prisjakt. You will find yourself teaming up with brilliant people, like backend and frontend magicians, awesome native developers, UX designers, Architects and DevOps experts.


To thrive in this role we think you're a doer at heart, who loves to drive initiatives. And if you run into any obstacles along the way - you adapt, find a solution and keep going.

**Come experiment with us**


With a treasure trove of data and a bustling user base, we’ve got our hands full, but that’s where the fun begins! We love to experiment, try new things, and find out what sticks, whether it’s through small releases or A/B testing. With your teammates by your side, you’ll learn from what didn’t go as planned, adapt and celebrate together when you hit the sweet spot. What we’ll end up with is epic functionality that our users love!

**What you will bring:**

* Proven experience of Node.js, TypeScript and GraphQL
* Can build React components in your sleep
* No stranger to continuous releases
* An agile mindset and a big amount of curiosity and drive
* Pair programming is second nature

**We’d be oh-so happy if you know your way around:**

* ElasticSearch
* NextJS
* GCP or other cloud service hosting
* MySQL
* Microservice thinking

**What we offer**


The very core in our employee experience is to care for our employees. With us you have flexible hours and a hybrid way of working where we meet 3 days per week in the studio. You get two paid working hours each week dedicated to working out and you’re always off on your birthday. If you’re curious to know more about life at Prisjakt, our benefits or why we exist you should definitely explore our career site. Want to meet the brilliant people and get a feel for the vibe at our studios? Make sure to follow us on Instagram @Prisjaktlife.

title: Senior QA Tester
description:
*If you’re looking to make the best co-op games in the world, you’ve come to the right place. We're proud to have some of the best game makers and collaborators in the industry within our four walls. What's more, we're a fun bunch of game developers, who love to indulge in our passion for video games together. Our games are not for everyone.*  

*Are they for you?*

**We are now looking for a Senior QA Tester**
---------------------------------------------


Arrowhead is now looking for a Senior QA Tester to further bolster our growing QA department. Join us as we continue to build on the success of Helldivers 2.This is an exciting opportunity where you will play a central role in the quality and assurance of our project and where you’ll work closely with all of our different development team

##### **Who you are:**


As a Senior QA Tester your main tasks and responsibilities are:

* Minimum of 5 years’ experience in software testing on multiple platforms (PC and Console Systems)
* Have an in-depth understanding of Title’s Systems, including engine
* Experience in writing, executing and monitoring test suites using a variety of technologies
* Work on team schedule
* Experience with Compliance Testing within manufacturer’s guidelines
* Be an expert in one or more software testing methodologies
* ISTQB Certified Tester Advanced Level (CTAL) or equivalent
* Proven ability to analyze, interpret, and action on data sets and complex workflows
* Ownership of testing tools usage and improvements (Jira, TestRail, new technologies, etc)
* Passion for video games and software development

**Other requirements**  

* Analytical and logical thinking to understand and analyze both low-level and high-level test processes
* High attention to detail
* Ability to work closely within the team and with other disciplines
* Outstanding communication skills

**What you'll do**


Do you have experience in QA and do you recognize yourself in the following skills and requirements:

  

* Multiplayer day to day QA Testing of the title on multiple platforms (PC and Console) - 40-50% of the total time
* Ensure that bug database is always up-to-date with high-quality bug reports and test passes
* Embed within a development team, testing a variety of functions and support them through specific dev and bug requests
* Responsible for adhering to department SLAs within project management (i.e. JIRA) and test related tools (i.e. TestRail) and enforce them onto the rest of the team
* Utilize advanced testing methodologies to deliver test design, test execution, test library maintenance, and test closure strategies according to industry standards
* Assist QA Lead in Planning, writing, executing and maintaining test plans according to industry standards
* Research and propose testing tools to improve testing efficiency with QA Lead, including test automation
* Propose and influence new measures and KPIs to validate and report on software quality
* Overview and follow up on Compliance Testing for submission with QA Lead and Release Manager
* Advocate of the user experience through delivery of qualitative reporting
* Other duties as assigned in support of QA Lead, including acting as secondary PoC with external partners
* Occasionally participate in extra activities (ie. trailer recordings, etc.)

##### **How to apply**


If you think that this position matches your background and skills, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your CV in English as soon as possible. We ask that your application always include relevant work samples or a link to your portfolio.


We interview candidates continuously and hire when we find a good fit.  

  



  

##### **Practical Information**

**Scope:** Full-time: 40 hours per week with initial 6 month probation period.  

**Location:** Office first, hybrid solution possible. You need to be eligble to work in Sweden.

 **We are a pet friendly office! You can expect to find dogs and occasionally some cats around.**

  

##### **What we offer**


Arrowhead Game Studios is a growing team of about 100+ people, best known for our co-op titles. Despite our size, we remain a friendly and down to earth bunch, who love to indulge in our passion for video games together.


Located in a newly built, custom-tailored offices on the Hammarby Kaj waterfront, we enjoy everything Stockholm has to offer. A thriving game dev scene, along with all types of activities are immediately available on our doorstep.


Our talented developers are crucial to our success, therefore we put a lot of emphasis in creating and maintaining a prosperous culture. We’re committed to open and transparent communication. Your ideas are welcomed, valued, appreciated - the ceiling for creative discussions is high.


We also have numerous work benefits for all our employees. You can read about them here!
company_description: Arrowhead Game Studios is a mid-sized game developer located in Stockholm, Sweden. We have released four games to date for PlayStation & PC.

title: Quality Assurance Manager-Test Automation
description:
Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for customers across Europe. We are looking for “**Quality Assurance Manager-Test Automation**” to join the team to build, support and drive customer innovations, bringing efficiency to the processes through efficient management of cost and schedule.


In alignment with Avigna’s values, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day.

**Experience:** 6+

**Location:** Malmo

**Mode of work:** Hybrid

**Duration:** 6 Months

**Responsibilities :**

  

* We are looking for positive team players who are passionate about creating value and who like to take the lead from a technology perspective. You are comfortable leading/participating in quality assurance and related areas including modern integration principles and methods.
* We believe that you are someone who can work in uncertainty and enjoy working in a high-paced environment. You have a proven ability to bring structure to a complex environment, you feel comfortable to make decisions and you inspire others to follow your lead while applying good practices.
* You can work action-oriented, turning strategy into operational actions making things happen in the organisation. Your curious nature helps you to actively acquire new knowledge and skills, using them to champion new methods and processes to improve how things are done and delivered.
* Analysing requirements and user stories to create automated test cases to secure the quality of our new D365 Finance & Operations platform.
* Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Test automation tools, e.g. The TestMart, LeapWork, Executive Automate or Tricentis ToscaTest design techniques Azure DevOpsExperience with other Azure Services Experience with other, similar tools and technologies is also of interest.

**What we offer:**

* Access to a strong developer community within the company to learn and grow.
* Competitive Salary, Good work-life balance along with health and life insurance

title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce Lead
description:
**Avigna is hiring “Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce Lead”**


Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for customers across Europe. We are looking for “**Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce Lead**” to join the team to build, support and drive customer innovations, bringing efficiency to the processes through efficient management of cost and schedule.


In alignment with Avigna’s values, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day.


Experience:6+


Location:Malmo


Mode of work: Onsite


Responsibilities :


* 1. **Technical Leadership:** Lead a team of developers in the analysis, design, development, implementation, and maintenance of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce solutions.


* 2. **Expertise in Dynamics 365 Commerce:** Utilize extensive expertise in Dynamics 365 Commerce, including but not limited to Finance and Operations, Power Platform integration, Customer Service, and other D365 products built on Power Platform.


* 3. **Application Development:** Design, develop, and maintain application code in various contexts, ensuring high-quality software solutions that meet client requirements.


* 4. **Client Communication:** Communicate technical concepts clearly with non-technical audiences, bridging the gap between technology and business requirements.


* 5. **Software Development Skills:** Utilize C#, SQL Server, and .NET framework proficiency to develop large-scale web applications, with a focus on application testing, complex code development, and component design.


* 6. **Extensions Development:** Demonstrate deep knowledge in developing extensions for Point of Sale, Commerce Runtime, and Hardware Station, including trigger & handlers creation.


* 7. **DevOps and Release Management:** Implement DevOps practices, oversee technical architecture, and manage release management processes, including CI/CD pipeline setup and maintenance.


* 8. **Tool Proficiency:** Use tools such as Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, Azure DevOps, and GitHub for development, version control, and project management.


* 9. **Data Modeling and Documentation:** Develop data models, document software solutions, and ensure adherence to best practices in software documentation.


* 10. **Power Platform Experience:** Leverage Power Platform to build adoptions, reports, and apps as addons to Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations, enhancing the overall functionality and user experience.


**Qualifications:**


* 1. Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information Systems, or related field.


* 2. Minimum of 3 years of software design and development experience using C#, SQL Server, and .NET framework.


* 3. Extensive experience (3+ years) in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce, with a focus on application development, complex code development, and component design.


* 4. Proficiency in developing extensions for Point of Sale, Commerce Runtime, and Hardware Station within Dynamics 365 Commerce.


* 5. Strong understanding of DevOps practices, release management, CI/CD pipelines, and technical architecture.


* 6. Expertise in utilizing development tools such as Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, Azure DevOps, and GitHub.


* 7. Experience with data modeling, software documentation, and Power Platform integration is highly desirable.



What we offer:

* Access to a strong developer community within the company to learn and grow.
* Competitive Salary, Good work-life balance along with health and life insurance

title: Community Ambassador
description:
As a Community Ambassador, you work as a part-time freelancer to support the activation, moderation, and development of the community and audience for a brand. You support the growth and engagement of a healthy and inclusive community by assisting in the execution of the community plan and supporting the management of relevant social media accounts and channels.


You are also responsible for measuring the success rate of the content and community activities you conduct, providing reporting on reach, engagement, community feedback, and sentiment to your community manager.


You report to the Community Manager of the brand and work closely with them in day-to-day operations. You are responsible for the brand media channels assigned to you (Weibo, BiliBili, Zhihu, WeChat, QQ groups, Paradox Forum, Steam, or others).


You define your number of weekly working hours in agreement with your Community Manager, depending on the needs of the brand and activity in the community. This can vary along the lifecycle of a project. You are paid as a freelance worker, on the number of effective work hours reported, normally not exceeding 20 hours per week, at an hourly rate defined in your contract.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Manage and moderate the brand social media accounts assigned to you.
* Act as the bridge between your assigned brand and Chinese players.
* Collect feedback from and engage with Chinese players.
* Prepare the text copies to be shared on social media platforms and beyond.
* Localize developer diaries and videos.

**Required Qualifications**

* Proficiency in English both written and verbal.
* Proficiency in Mandarin both written and verbal
* Strong interpersonal skills and composure.
* Good knowledge of Chinese social media platforms.
* Interest and experience with Strategy games.

**Desirable**

* Experience in community-focused projects, like moderating, administrating or leading thriving fan communities and initiatives.
* Experience managing social media accounts, as well as online communities on Weibo, Baidu Tieba, QQ groups and other platforms (content production, posting, moderation, etc.).
* Interest in History
* Experience with translating text into Mandarin.
* Good knowledge of Photoshop and other editing tools.

**Practical information**

* Scope: Hourly-paid, part-time freelance / contracting job
* Reports to: Community Manager
* Location: Remote work

title: Principal ICT and Security Operations Lead
description:
Engineering at Klarna is an inspired, customer focused community, dedicated to crafting solutions that redefine our industry. Working in small, highly collaborative Agile teams, you and your team will have a clear mission and ownership of an important outcome that supports Klarna and our customers.


At Klarna we optimize for quality, flow, fast feedback, focusing on end-to-end ownership, continuous improvement, testing, monitoring and experimentation. We aim for teams that are inclusive, helpful, and have a strong sense of ownership for the things they build. Our engineers make some of the most significant decisions for the company and we are looking for bold, open and curious developers. As a Klarnaut, you’ll be inspired to contribute to the growth of one of the World's most highly valued fintech, and your work will impact the lives of our millions of users.  

Help us make shopping online even more smoooth!

#### **What you'll get to do:**


Reporting directly to the Chief Security Risk Officer (CSRO) in the 2nd line of defence, you will lead and mentor a dynamic team responsible for the company's audit, compliance, and technical security operations oversight. Your role involves leading strategic oversight of Klarna’s security policies and compliance frameworks, ensuring alignment with business objectives and regulatory requirements. You will collaborate with senior stakeholders across the organization to develop security strategies that not only protect the company's assets and data but also enhance operational efficiencies and customer trust.

#### **Who you are?**


You are a seasoned leader in the fields of security, governance and compliance, with a proven track record of managing diverse teams. At Klarna, you will harness your strategic insight and technical expertise to drive robust security practices and ensure compliance with global regulatory standards. Your leadership is characterized by a proactive approach and a deep understanding of the intricacies of cybersecurity, audit procedures, and regulatory compliance.

#### **Key Responsibilities:**

  

Lead, develop, and manage the EA Operations team promoting a holistic approach to Klarna’s security, governance and compliance initiatives.


Design and implement comprehensive security strategies and frameworks that address the full spectrum of Klarna’s risk landscape.


Oversee the execution of regular security risk assessments, penetration testing, and compliance audits, ensuring that all practices meet industry standards and regulatory requirements.


Lead comprehensive audits such as SOX, ISAE (SOC2), PCAOB, SWIFT, PCI-DSS etc. to ensure Klarna’s compliance with all relevant financial and security regulations. Strategically guide the audit process from planning through execution, coordinating with internal teams and external auditors to ensure thorough coverage and adherence to all regulatory requirements.


Foster strong relationships with regulatory bodies, staying ahead of changes in compliance laws and standards to dynamically adapt Klarna’s policies and procedures.


Drive the development and implementation of training programs to raise security and compliance awareness across all departments.


Regularly report to Klarna’s senior management on the status of security and compliance efforts, providing strategic insights and recommendations for enhancements.

#### **Required Skill Set/Experience**


Proficiency in both written and spoken English, enabling you to comprehend regulatory requirements and contracts effortlessly and lead meetings efficiently.

  

A minimum of 7 years of experience as an Information Security Professional with a technical background, as well as experience in managing an ISMS or its components.


Proven leadership skills with the ability to manage and inspire a team of security and compliance professionals.


Proven experience in defining, testing (automation) and monitoring of controls. A solid grasp of their organizational impact, particularly in relation to Engineering teams.


A thorough understanding of how information security assurance is implemented in practice, with a strong desire to optimize and simplify its application.


Strong analytical skills with the ability to leverage data for informed decision-making. Basic Python and experience in prompt engineering (ChatGPT) is desired.


Strong knowledge of global financial regulations, cybersecurity frameworks, and best practices (e.g., GDPR, PCI-DSS, ISO/IEC 27001).


Strong communication and interpersonal skills, capable of engaging effectively with both technical teams and executive management.
company_description: We make shopping smoooth.

title: Vi söker .Net utvecklare till ledande Fintech bolag
description:
### **OM JOBBET**


*Affärerna* *blomstrar och de ser nu till att stärka sin fantastiska FoU-avdelning i Sverige med ytterligare några grymma systemutvecklare.* *För att möta nya utmaningar på väg in på den europeiska marknaden är de på en resa från nuvarande storskaliga agila organisation mot ett mer utvecklingsorienterat sätt att arbeta och komma utvecklaren närmare våra kunder. Låter detta som något du skulle tycka är spännande? Ansök nu!*

### **OM FÖRETAGET**


Vår kund är ett mjukvaruföretag som utvecklar ett affärssystem för liv- och pensionsbranschen. Företaget är marknadsledare i Norden och håller på att expandera till Europa.


Teamet består av 350 personer och växer i takt med att de lägger till fler begåvade, engagerade och exceptionella personer till HQ i Stockholm.

### **ARBETSUPPGIFTER**

* Du kommer att arbeta i ett av våra agila team och bygga och underhålla vår marknadsledande försäkringsprodukt
* Lär dig, lär ut och verkställ – tillsammans med ditt team
* Arbeta med tekniker som .Net, SQL, React och Java samt lär dig nya saker löpande
* Leverera högkvalitativ, lätt underhållbar programvara

### 

### **ERFARENHETER OCH EGENSKAPER**


Troligen har du en högskoleutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet genom att ha jobbat några år som utvecklare. Vidare tror vi att du;

  

* älskar en miljö där du aldrig slutar lära dig nya saker
* har ett lösningsorienterat tänkesätt
* får energi av att arbeta tillsammans med fantastiska människor i ett team
* ser vikten av kommunikation, öppenhet och transparens
* känner att det är viktigt att kunna känna sig stolt över det du levererar
* känner dig bekväm med att både tala och skriva på Svenska och Engelska

### 

### **VAD KOMMER DU UPPLEVA**

* Fantastiska kollegor, bland de bästa inom området
* Knepiga problem att lösa varje dag
* En IT-organisation med kundkunskap inom affärsverksamheten
* Förmåner med extra fokus på arbete och balans i livet

### 

### **OM D-SOURCE**

*Your source to IT*  

D-Source är ett modernt konsultbolag med bredden mellan helpdesk, infrastruktur och Tech. Vi har lång erfarenhet av att förstå kunders IT-behov! Tveka inte att höra av dig om du är intresserad av att ta reda på mer.


Vad kan vi göra för dig och vad kan vi göra tillsammans?  



  

### **INGET JOBB FÖR DIG?**


Lugnt! Du kan alltid registrera dig förutsättningslöst på D-Source jobbsida genom att Connecta med oss. Då hamnar du i vår kandidatdatabas och får koll på våra kommande aktuella tjänster.

title: Senior Frontend-utvecklare till plattformen för hållbara...
description:
Så låt oss skippa allt krimskrams – här är beskrivningen på den vi söker. Är det du? På andra sidan väntar ditt drömjobb.

Vi ser att du ska...
